meanings.definition: To produce (something) jointly with another person or group.
meanings.sent2: The movie was coproduced by two famous directors.
meanings.sent3: The siblings coproduced a hilarious skit for the talent show.
meanings.sent4: Their collaboration coproduced a masterpiece that amazed everyone.
meanings.sent5: Working together, they coproduced a fantastic result.

meanings.definition: Produced jointly by two or more parties.
meanings.sent1: It was a coproduced event with multiple sponsors.
meanings.sent2: The coproduced album featured songs from various artists.
meanings.sent3: The coproduced cake had layers from different bakers.
meanings.sent4: The coproduced movie showcased talents from different studios.
meanings.sent5: The coproduced project was a blend of creativity and teamwork.
